article_title: Lifelong Republican Buys Obamacare Silver Plan And Says

article_metadata.description: This week's political narrative is definitely shifting. Clearly there's been a lot of focus on the Government shutdown – which some are working overtime to paint as "gridlock." If you're among that group – this would be a great time to check out the recent interview between Ezra Klein (Washington Post) [...]
